column1: Visitation will be held on Sunday
column3: 2015 from 2:00PM to 4:00PM at Beck Funeral Home
column5: Cedar Park. Kim's family will gather for a service to celebrate and give thanks for her life and her faith on Monday
column7: 2015 at 10:00AM at Beck Funeral Home in Cedar Park. Interment will follow at Liberty Hill Cemetery in Liberty Hill
